name: Detective's Illusion
description:
A detective finds himself in the room of his murdered friend. His task? To solve the puzzles that would lead him to his friend’s killer, only to realize there’s more to the story that meets the eye.

Submitted for the Brackeys Game Jam 2022.

How to play : 

WASD = move

right click = pick/drop object, interact

Shift = hold to rotate object when holding

1,2,3 = switching between binocular lenses
